claims.object: Localization centered on reconfigurable intelligent surfaces (RISs)

surface_layer.definition: A localization technique utilizing reconfigurable intelligent surfaces to illuminate and reconstruct a region of interest.

deep_layer.mechanism: Spatial information is encoded into a sequence of measurements using diverse radiation patterns and subsequently processed to reconstruct the region of interest.
deep_layer.origin: Emerges from advancements in reconfigurable intelligent surfaces and backward sensing paradigms.

epistemic_metadata.source: Source Localization and Power Estimation through RISs ...
